csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
    class="in-text"
    xml:lang="en"
    version="1.0">
    <info>
      <id></id>
      <title></title>
      <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
    </info>
    <terms>
      <locale xml:lang="en">
          <option name="punctuation-in-quote" value="true"/>
      </locale>
    </terms>
    <citation>
        <layout suffix=".">
            <group delimiter=", ">
                <names variable="author">
                    <name form="short"/>
                </names>
                <text variable="title" quotes="true"/>
                <date variable="issued">
                    <date-part name="year"/>
                </date>
            </group>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
